oie

Interface Cell

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicCell, GooseCell, NormalCell, TeleportationCell, TrapCell, WaitingCell, ZeroCell

    public interface Cell
    Interface for the cells of the "jeu de l'oie" game.
    Note that there can be only one player by cell, the starting cell (index 0) excepted.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeLeft() 
      int consequence(int diceThrow)
      returns the index of the cell really reached by a player when he reaches this cell
      int getIndex()
      returns the index of this cell
      Player getPlayer()
      gets the player in this cell null if none
      boolean isBusy()
      returns true iff a player is in this cell
      void setPlayer(Player player)
      sets a player in this cell

    • Method Detail

      • canBeLeft

        boolean canBeLeft()
        Returns:
        true if and only if the player in this cell can freely leaves the cell, else he must wait for another player to reach this cell or wait a given number of turns

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        returns the index of this cell

      • consequence

        int consequence(int diceThrow)
        returns the index of the cell really reached by a player when he reaches this cell
        Parameters:
        diceThrow - the result of the dices when the player reaches this cell
        Returns:
        the index of the cell effectively reached when a player reaches this cell after the given throw of dices

      • isBusy

        boolean isBusy()
        returns true iff a player is in this cell

      • setPlayer

        void setPlayer(Player player)
        sets a player in this cell

      • getPlayer

        Player getPlayer()
        gets the player in this cell null if none
